at.irian.ankor.application

Class GenericApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.irian.ankor.application.GenericApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Application

    public class GenericApplication
extends Object
implements Application
    Convenient Application implementation, that is easily configurable and implements reasonable default behaviour. This implementation is ideal for those who want to configure their Application in Bean style by creating a GenericApplication object and then setting several properties.

    Defaults are:

    • Name: "unnamed"
    • Known model names: "root"
    • stateless: no

      • lookupModel

        public Object lookupModel(String modelName,
                 Map<String,Object> connectParameters)
        Description copied from interface: Application
        Lookup a model by one or more (application specific) connect parameters. Typical parameters are:
        • username
        • browser cookie
        • device id
        • ...
        Applications are free to just return null on every call to this method. Returning null is the expected behaviour for applications that do not support restoring (user) sessions.
        Specified by:
        lookupModel in interface Application
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of model
        connectParameters - lookup criteria
        Returns:
        existing Model instance or null if there is no matching model yet

      • createModel

        public Object createModel(String modelName,
                 Map<String,Object> connectParameters,
                 RefContext refContext)
        Description copied from interface: Application
        Create a new instance of a model root that matches the given model name and the (application specific) connect parameters.
        Specified by:
        createModel in interface Application
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of model
        connectParameters - (optional) connect parameters
        refContext - RefContext for the corresponding ModelSession
        Returns:
        newly created model root
